message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The smooth endoplasmic reticulum (SER) is responsible for steroid hormone synthesis, lipid synthesis, and chemical detoxification. The Golgi bodies function in protein modification, sorting, and packaging. Peroxisomes are responsible for lipid metabolism and oxidative reactions. The nucleolus is involved in ribosomal RNA synthesis and assembly.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on biology for help. Among the options, only smooth endoplasmic reticulum is responsible for steroid hormone synthesis, lipid synthesis, and chemical detoxification. Golgi bodies are responsible for processing and packaging proteins, peroxisomes are responsible for breaking down fatty acids, and nucleolus is responsible for ribosome assembly.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on biology for help. The smooth endoplasmic reticulum is responsible for the synthesis of steroid hormones, the synthesis of lipids, and the detoxification of chemicals. The Golgi bodies are responsible for processing and packaging of proteins. Peroxisomes are responsible for breaking down fatty acids and producing hydrogen peroxide. The nucleolus is responsible for the production of ribosomes.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The smooth endoplasmic reticulum is involved in steroid hormone synthesis, lipid synthesis, and chemical detoxification. The Golgi bodies are involved in modifying and sorting proteins, the peroxisomes are involved in lipid metabolism and detoxification of hydrogen peroxide, and the nucleolus is involved in ribosome biogenesis.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Among the options, only the smooth endoplasmic reticulum is responsible for steroid hormone synthesis, lipid synthesis, and chemical detoxification. Golgi bodies are responsible for modifying, sorting, and packaging proteins, while peroxisomes are involved in lipid metabolism and detoxification of hydrogen peroxide. The nucleolus is responsible for ribosome biogenesis.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. Smooth Endoplasmic Reticulum is responsible for steroid hormone synthesis, lipid synthesis, and chemical detoxification. Golgi bodies are responsible for protein modification and sorting, peroxisomes for lipid breakdown and detoxification, and nucleolus for ribosome synthesis.

We refer to a biology textbook or trusted online sources for help. Smooth Endoplasmic Reticulum (SER) is responsible for steroid hormone synthesis, lipid synthesis, and chemical detoxification. Golgi bodies are responsible for processing and packaging proteins. Peroxisomes are responsible for the breakdown of fatty acids and the detoxification of harmful substances. The nucleolus is responsible for the production of ribosomal RNA.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on biology for help. Steroid hormone synthesis and lipid synthesis are functions of smooth endoplasmic reticulum, while chemical detoxification is also a function of smooth endoplasmic reticulum, although peroxisomes play a role in detoxification as well. Golgi bodies are involved in packaging and sorting proteins, while the nucleolus is involved in ribosome formation.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medical knowledge for help. Smooth Endoplasmic Reticulum is responsible for steroid hormone synthesis, lipid synthesis, and chemical detoxification, while Golgi bodies are primarily responsible for packaging and modifying proteins. Peroxisomes are involved in lipid metabolism and detoxification, but not steroid hormone synthesis. The nucleolus is responsible for ribosome biogenesis.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on biology for help. Smooth Endoplasmic Reticulum (SER) is responsible for steroid hormone synthesis, lipid synthesis, and chemical detoxification. The Golgi bodies package and modify proteins, while peroxisomes are involved in the breakdown of fatty acids and metabolism of toxins. The nucleolus is responsible for the production of ribosomes.
